reviews.review_msg: wow, so mean & rude when she talks to people in office hours! mayb cuz its not recorded anymore! when u ask her to clarify smth u dont understand, she says, "u tell me" ..ok, i dont understand clearly, that is y i ask u, dr.Vera! MT is too hard & tricky! VERA, PLEASE READ CAREFULY, this is the ..ONLY & FIRST STATS.. course IS & POL majors take!!

Nice prof, but having the class late on Fridays and it being stats wasn't fun.  The labs are kind of fun, you get to diddle with a computer program.  And it's a class that is geared for people who AREN'T math people (IS) so if you do the work, and ask for help from Vera you can do just fine!

Vera is a helpful teacher who is easily approachable and who wants her students to do well. She has a wicked sense of humor and shes sexy as hell! Some of the comments below seem to reveal some questionable use of the English language. I wonder if that has anything to do with their comprehension...?
She had some pretty hilarious jokes and cartoons! One of my favourite profs so far.
